description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Seafood With Herb Avocado Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Barbecued Seafood With Herb Avocado Butter
name: Barbecued Seafood With Herb Avocado Butter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 small thick white boneless fish fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Place fillets, seafood skewers and mussels onto a large platter. Add prawns and oysters. Serve immediately with avocado butter and lemon wedges.
